column4: Can someone help me out? When I install the Ubuntu 10.04 Minimal CD, it tells em to restart the computer after it's done installing, so I restart and pop out the CD and I'm pretty sure it boots because it just sits there with a cursor blinking
What type of computer did you install it to?
its a desktop pc.. it can install the regular ubuntu just fine with no problems
I had that happen once when I installed Ubuntu on a Mac. Just curious.
but with ubuntu minimal CD, it just hangs at a blank screen after bootingh
Hmm. When you boot you might try accessing GRUB and configuring the way it boots.
